languages.text: {n}Старик не приукрашивает: он и его творения обладают особой связью — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}вы чувствуете{/d} это так же явственно, как и другие дуновения варпа.{/n}

{n}There is no embellishment in the old man's words — he shares a special bond with his creations, one that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}you can sense{/d} as clearly as any other breath of the warp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Старик не приукрашивает: он и его творения обладают особой связью — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}вы чувствуете{/d} это так же явственно, как и другие дуновения варпа.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个老人的话并不是某种隐喻，他与他的雕塑之间存在着某种特殊的联系。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}你可以清楚地感觉{/d}到这种联系，就像感受亚空间的脉络一样清晰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no embellishment in the old man's words — he shares a special bond with his creations, one that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}you can sense{/d} as clearly as any other breath of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个老人的话并不是某种隐喻，他与他的雕塑之间存在着某种特殊的联系。你可以清楚地{/d}感觉{/n}到这种联系，就像感受亚空间的脉络一样清晰。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}

languages.text: {n}老人の言葉に誇張はない。彼は自分の創造物と特別な絆を共有しており、それは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}あなたにも感知できる{/d}〈歪み〉の他の息吹と同じくらいはっきりとしたものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no embellishment in the old man's words — he shares a special bond with his creations, one that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}you can sense{/d} as clearly as any other breath of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人の言葉に誇張はない。彼は自分の創造物と特別な絆を共有しており、それは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}あなたにも感知できる{/d}〈歪み〉の他の息吹と同じくらいはっきりとしたものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}No hay ninguna exageración en las palabras del anciano: comparte un vínculo especial con sus creaciones, y {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}puedes sentirlo{/d} con tanta claridad que cualquier otro aliento de la disformidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no embellishment in the old man's words — he shares a special bond with his creations, one that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}you can sense{/d} as clearly as any other breath of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No hay ninguna exageración en las palabras del anciano: comparte un vínculo especial con sus creaciones, y {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}puedes sentirlo{/d} con tanta claridad que cualquier otro aliento de la disformidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In den Worten des alten Mannes liegt keine Schönfärberei – er hat eine besondere Beziehung zu seinen Werken, und du kannst sie {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}so klar spüren{/d} wie jeden anderen Atemzug des Warp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no embellishment in the old man's words — he shares a special bond with his creations, one that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}you can sense{/d} as clearly as any other breath of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In den Worten des alten Mannes liegt keine Schönfärberei – er hat eine besondere Beziehung zu seinen Werken, und du kannst sie {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}so klar spüren{/d} wie jeden anderen Atemzug des Warp.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İhtiyarın sözlerinde en ufak bir abartı yok. Yaratıklarıyla arasında özel bir bağı var ve bu bağı, tıpkı öteboyutun diğer her bir nefesinde olduğu gibi net bir şekilde {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}hissedebiliyorsun{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no embellishment in the old man's words — he shares a special bond with his creations, one that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}you can sense{/d} as clearly as any other breath of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İhtiyarın sözlerinde en ufak bir abartı yok. Yaratıklarıyla arasında özel bir bağı var ve bu bağı, tıpkı öteboyutun diğer her bir nefesinde olduğu gibi net bir şekilde {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}hissedebiliyorsun{/d}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Point d'enjolivement dans les propos du vieil homme : il partage avec ses créations un lien spécial, un lien que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}vous percevez{/d} aussi clairement que tout autre souffle du Warp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no embellishment in the old man's words — he shares a special bond with his creations, one that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}you can sense{/d} as clearly as any other breath of the warp.{/n}
